scripts.composer_remove: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 composer.phar dumpauto"
scripts.composer_install: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 composer.phar install"
scripts.composer_update: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 composer.phar update"
scripts.migrate_rep: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan migrate"
scripts.rollback_rep: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan migrate:rollback"
scripts.seed_rep: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan DB:seed"
scripts.seed_rep_one: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan DB:seed NewFeedbackSeederGis"
scripts.db_update: npm run rollback_rep && npm run migrate_rep && npm run seed_rep
scripts.db_update_total: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan migrate:refresh --seed"
scripts.optimized_rep: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 composer.phar update --optimize-autoloader --no-dev"
scripts.dump_autoload: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 composer.phar dump-autoload"
scripts.storage_link: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan storage:link"
scripts.key_gen: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan key:generate"
scripts.cache_config: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan config:cache"
scripts.cache_route: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan route:cache"
scripts.cache_view: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan view:cache"
scripts.cache_clear: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan cache:clear"
scripts.optimize: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan optimize"
scripts.optimize_all: npm run optimize && npm run cache_clear && npm run cache_view && npm run cache_route && npm run cache_config
scripts.orchid_user: ssh bereggfx_all@bereggfx.beget.tech "cd bereggfx.beget.tech/public_html && php8.2 artisan orchid:admin admin asmi046@gmail.com 123"
scripts.deploy_m: vite build && npm run send_vite_build && npm run pull_rep && npm run optimize_all
